content: Hey Angela! Nice to meet ya. How've you been since last time?
Hey Mia! It's been well for me. I just had a press conference yesterday to talk about my cold cure. It was awesome! Anything exciting going on with you?
That sounds awesome Angela! For me, I just held a charity walk for the cancer hospital in our community yesterday - felt so great!
Wow Mia, that's awesome! You're really dedicated to helping out. Tell me more about the charity walk?
Nice photo! We did the 5k charity walk in a bit over two hours. It was amazing to see people come together like that for a good cause.
Oh, that's awesome! Community events for charity are so cool. Did the cancer hospital have any personal meaning to you that made you want to plan the walk?
Yeah, actually a friend of mine got cancer last year and it motivated me to do something to help people going through the same.
Wow, that's really touching. It's awesome how personal experiences motivate us to help others. What have you and your friends done to support those in similar situations?
We've raised funds, volunteered at the hospital and raised awareness of cancer.
Cool! How'd you get into fundraising and volunteering?
I've always been into helping others and making a difference. I got involved with some local causes, it's been great! Have you ever done any charity stuff, Angela?
Never done charity work, but I'm keen to give it a go. Any suggestions?
How about start from organizing a bake sale for a local org! It's fun and helps support a great cause.
Oh that sounds like a great idea! What desserts do you recommend making?
We made cookies, brownies, cupcakes and it was a hit! Wanna join us?

Count me in! I'll bring science-themed cupcakes. Let's have a blast! Hey Mia! Crazy stuff happened since we talked. I got invited to a bunch of college campuses to talk about my research for a cold cure. It's been amazing!
Angela, that's amazing! I'm really proud of you. Feels great that your work is making a difference, right? How're the campus visits?
I know right!? The campus visits have been unreal – people are really excited about my research. It's like a bubble of joy wherever I go!
Sounds awesome! Must be amazing! Can you tell me more about the people you meet on campus visits?
I'm meeting people from all backgrounds who are passionate about health solutions - professors, students, researchers - it's really inspiring!
It's inspiring to see such a mixed and motivated group working together for one goal. How has this affected your view on tackling health issues?
Working together and hearing different views has really shown me how important they are for getting results.
That's cool! Working together and sharing ideas can help us come up with new solutions. Got any projects or ideas you're looking forward to tackling?
Yep! My lab pals and I are coming up with a platform for researchers to work together and tackle health problems. I'm stoked!
Wow that sounds awesome! Is there anything that I can help out in any way?
Of course! Any help would mean so much. Can you spread the word about our project? That'd be great!
Yep, I'm in! Let's spread the word about your project.
Thank you so much for your help. Let's do this!
Sure thing! I'm here for you. We can do great things together!
I'm sure we can make a big diffrence. Thanks for joining me on this.
I'm sure it's gonna be great. Btw, here's a picture of a Thank You card I made the other day. What do you think?
Wow thats beautiful! What gave you the idea to make a thank-you card?

I made this thank-you card for my student's parents after an open house. It felt great to have them in the classroom! Wanted to show my appreciation for how much they help their child with their education.
Aww, that was so nice of you, Mia! How did the students feel about the open house?
The students were thrilled to show their parents all their hard work and art. They were so glad their families could come see what they'd been up to.
Wow! Their projects are awesome! Where did they get such cool ideas?
I get them to use their imaginations and collaborate on projects, and it's awesome to see what they create! Wanna see more of their art?
Yeah, sure! Please show me more! It's inspiring to see what kids can do!
Here you go! Check out the art the kids made. They're so amazing!
Wow, that's great! Btw, would you like to create some art together? If so, got any ideas of what we can create?
How about a cooperative mural! Each of us can add their own piece and create an awesome end result!
Sounds fun! I love the idea, let's do it!
That's awesome! Can't wait to make art with you. Let's create something awesome!
Same here! Can't wait to make something awesome together. Gonna be fun!
Yeah, it'll be great! Can't wait!
Let's have a blast showing off our art skills! Here's somoething that I'm currently working on right now.
That looks cool! What kind of art do you want to work on?
I had an idea of doing a mural with lots of colors and designs. We could make it together by adding our own style. What do you think?
That's a great idea! A mural would be awesome, let's do this!
Ya! Let's use our creativity and have fun!
